headline: AEP Seeking Grants To Assist With Advanced Nuclear Site Exploration in Indiana and Virginia
summary: American Electric Power (Nasdaq: AEP) is seeking grants from the U.S. Department of Energy (USDOE) to support the Early Site Permit (ESP) process for two potential Small Modular Reactor (SMR) sites. Through its Indiana Michigan Power (I&M) operating company, AEP is announcing that property at the Rockport Plant in Spencer County, Indiana, has been identified as a potential SMR site.
